sense.def:
To harm someone or something
pomeni nekoga ali nekaj raniti ali poškodovati.

seg.quote: I stood very still, hoping they wouldn't harm my sister and me.

sense.def:
Harm
je telesna poškodba ali škoda, povzročena nekomu ali nečemu.

seg.quote: He went in danger of physical harm.
Do prisons do more harm than good?

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
will come to no harm
ali kadar
no harm will come to someone or something
, nekdo ali nekaj ne bo ranjen ali poškodovan.

Kadar je nekdo ali nekaj
out of harm's way
, je na varnem.

There is no harm in doing something
rečemo, če želimo povedati, da bi nekaj radi storili, in mislimo, da ni narobe.
